alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 11:58AM CST until December 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, some areas may see higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Minnesota and northeast North Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Near blizzard conditions are expected in open country Thursday. Heavy snow rates and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility Thursday. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commutes Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
